MESSAGE.value: Added a normal equalization factor for refraction.
Added a texture uit manager for dynamic texture unit allocation.
Changed skybox. Now it uses texture unit manager for texture allocation.
Changed perlin noise test. Now it uses texture unit manager.
TexturePreviewRenderer now uses texture unit manager.
Found a bug in texture unit manager. Fixed it.
Found a bug in texture unit manager, fixed it and fixed perlin noise texture renderer.
Found a bug in texture unit manager, fixed it and fixed skybox.
Found a bug in texture unit manager, fixed it and fixed texture preview renderer.
Refractored the code a little bit.
Basic water terrain now uses texture unit manager to allocate texture units.
Water tile renderer now uses texture unit manager.

Plan is to add a separate shader program for underground terrain in order to do caustics. Since it will need access to distortion and normal maps i plan to add decorators or rather composite renderers which will set these two textures and all required data.
Added a static class for distortion render decorator constants. Also added distortion render decorator instantiation.
Added a blue tint to the water and reduced the reflectivity.
Added a normal map render decorator.
Added a light render decorator.
Removed texture tiling.
Changed texture coordinates, now topLeft is 0,0.
Changed texture coordinates, now topLeft is 0, 0.
Added a caustics terrain, however it does not work properly.
Fixed caustics. However the technique is not very precise but it gives somewhat good looking effects.
Refraction texture now includes caustics.
Found an error in incident vector calculation.
Added my paper to the project along with every picture.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added my paper to the project along with every picture.
